name: Atlanta (ATL) - New Orleans (MSY) - Delta Boeing 757 Full Flight Experience, Awesome Approach!
description:
Welcome to this Full Flight Experience aboard a refurbished Boeing 757 from Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport to Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport! After an overnight stay in ATL, it's time to head off to a city I've never been to on one of my favorite planes!

This video covers boarding, taxi, take-off, the inflight experience, and the low approach over Louisiana's Gulf Coast.

Thanks for flying with me, and enjoy the ride!

Video Timeline
00:00 – Getting to the Gate
00:35 – Boarding and Preflight Delay
01:15 – Pushback and Taxi
02:10 – Takeoff and Climb
03:30 – IFE, Seat, and Inflight Experience
04:25 – Initial Descent
05:05 – Final Approach
06:10 – Landing and Taxi
07:10 – Gate Arrival and Conclusion
07:50 – End Screen

#flight #deltaairlines #dal #b757 #atlanta #atl #flightreview #flightreport #msy #neworleans 

__________________________________________________________________________________

Flight Information

Airline: Delta Air Lines

Flight Number: DL 2526

Date of Flight: September 2023

Origin Airport: Hartsfield-Jackson Atlanta International Airport (KATL/ATL)

Destination Airport: Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (KMSY/MSY)

Departing Gate: A3

Boarding Time: 06:49 EDT

Scheduled Departure: 07:10 EDT 

Actual Departure from Gate: 08:19 EDT

Takeoff Runway and Time: RWY 9L / 08:28 EDT

Landing Runway and Time: RWY 2 / 08:37 CDT

Scheduled Arrival: 07:39 CDT 

Actual Arrival at Gate: 08:45 CDT

Arriving Gate: C4


Total Flight Time: 1 hour, 9 minutes

Total Gate-to-Gate: 1 hour, 26 minutes

Distance between Airports: 424 mi/683 km


--------------------------------

Aircraft Information

Type: Boeing 757-232
Registration: N6710E
First Flight: August 2000

--------------------------------

Gear

Nikon D3200/18-55mm

GoPro Hero 7 Black and Suction Mount

Edited in Adobe Premiere Pro/IrfanView/ClipStudio
